data.name: Money Time!
data.description: Gold opens many doors. Use 20 bags of gold and enjoy your fortune.

data.name: Carnivore
data.description: Only the bravest dare eat hellhound meat. Use 500 cooked hellhound meats and embrace your carnivorous side.

data.name: Highway Patrol
data.description: No traveler is safe while highwaymen lurk. Patrol the roads and defeat 2 500 Highwaymen.

data.name: Slimed to None
data.description: A monstrous slime crowned in the forest. Prove your worth by defeating the King Slime.

data.name: Potion Brewer
data.description: The art of alchemy flows through your hands. Craft 100 Enchanted Health Splash Potions.

data.name: Scorpion Feast
data.description: Even venomous beasts can be a delicacy. Consume 500 Cooked Desert Scorpion Meats.

data.name: Gourmet Chef
data.description: Fish soup warms the soul. Use 300 Fish Soups and show your gourmet skills.

data.name: Grand Master
data.description: Few ascend to such heights. Reach level 50 and earn the title of Grand Master.

data.name: The New King
data.description: After defeating the undead monarch, claim the coveted Lich Crown as your own. Drop a Lich Crown.

data.name: Swordbreaker
data.description: Only true warriors can shatter legends. Drop 25 Broken Swords and earn the Swordbreaker name.

data.name: Magic Power
data.description: Legends whisper of the Magic Shield. Craft it and wield arcane power.

data.name: Crafted with Honor
data.description: A Masterful Necklace is the mark of a true artisan. Craft one and wear your honor.

data.name: Bite! Oh, algae!
data.description: Sometimes, all you catch is algae. Gather 2 500 algaes and embrace the surprises of fishing.

data.name: Welcome to Hell
data.description: A weapon forged from knowledge straight from hell. Craft a Hell Reaper.

data.name: Enchanted Alchemist
data.description: Enchanted health potions restore body and soul. Craft 250 enchanted health potions.

data.name: Real Canadian
data.description: Nothing says Canadian like maple syrup. Craft 250 maple syrups and celebrate the sweet life.

data.name: Diamond In The Sky
data.description: Diamonds are forever. Craft 2 diamonds and cherish your treasures.

data.name: Magic Harvester
data.description: Magic sap is the lifeblood of enchanted forests. Gather 500 Magic Saps.

data.name: Secure the island
data.description: Defeat 50 Sea Marauders to secure the island, earn the villagers trust, and unlock access to the bank.

data.name: Clean the lab
data.description: Defeat 100 Cultist Alchemist to secure the house and unlock access to the Rosenblood.

data.name: Sands of Power
data.description: The Sandwhisper Empress commands the desert with ancient magic. Defeat her and end her reign over the dunes.

data.name: Blood of the Cursed
data.description: In his house, Rosenblood awaits challengers. End the curse by defeating Rosenblood.

data.name: The Worm Turns
data.description: Face the terror of dusk and slay the Duskworm.

data.name: Warden of the Sands
data.description: The desert guardians never rest. Prove your might by defeating 1 000 Sandwardens.

data.name: Shining Secrets
data.description: Rare and radiant, alexandrite is a gem of mystery. Craft 2 Alexandrite to master its brilliance.

data.name: Life Lover
data.description: The shards of life are rare and precious. Prove your devotion by dropping 24 Life Crystal Shards.

data.name: Its Malefic!
data.description: Malefic Shards pulse with forbidden energy. Drop 24 of these shards to harness their power.

data.name: The planet thanks you
data.description: Your eco-actions inspire others. Recycle 5 000 items and earn the planet’s gratitude.

data.name: Elementary Book
data.description: Elemental pages hold ancient secrets. Drop 30 Elemental Pages and unlock the power of the elements.

data.name: Corruption Eradicator
data.description: Corrupted Gems are the source of many evils. Drop 800 Corrupted Gems and cleanse the world.

data.name: Demonic Slayer
data.description: Grimlets are the spawn of the abyss. Slay 1 000 Grimlets and earn the title of Demonic Slayer.

data.name: Cultist Purifier
data.description: Cultist Acolytes threaten the world with their dark devotion. Cleanse the realm by killing 1 500 Cultist Acolytes.

data.name: Coin Collector
data.description: Wealth lies buried in the island of Sandwhisper. Collect 500 Sandwhisper Coins from its foes.

data.name: Heartbound
data.description: Legends speak of an amulet forged with life’s essence. Craft a Heart Amulet to claim its power.

data.name: Eat the forbidden fruit
data.description: Corrupted Fruits tempt all who seek power. Use 100 Corrupted Fruits and taste the forbidden.

data.name: Tasks Coins Fan
data.description: A thousand tasks completed—your legend as a helper grows! Complete 1 000 tasks.

data.name: Secrets in the Sand
data.description: The Sandwhisper Empress guards forbidden knowledge. Collect 24 Codex Pages from her grasp.

data.name: Sultan Slayer
data.description: Legends speak of the Efreet Sultans ruling the burning sands with fiery magic. Prove your courage by slaying 1 000 Efreet Sultans.
